reactor.tcp.config

Class CommonSocketOptions<SO extends CommonSocketOptions<? super SO>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • reactor.tcp.config.CommonSocketOptions<SO>
  • Type Parameters:
    SO - A CommonSocketOptions subclass
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClientSocketOptions, ServerSocketOptions

    public abstract class CommonSocketOptions<SO extends CommonSocketOptions<? super SO>>
extends java.lang.Object
    Encapsulates common socket options.
